title: Alabaster DePlume Announces Tour and New Album, Shares Video for New Song: Watch
description: “Oh My Actual Days” opens the British jazz artist’s A Blade Because a Blade Is Whole
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: “Oh My Actual Days” opens the British jazz artist’s A Blade Because a Blade Is Whole
text: Alabaster DePlume:03-14 Philadelphia, PA - Underground Arts *03-15 Kingston, NY - Tubby’s *03-16 New York, NY - LPR *03-18 Washington, D.C. - Black Cat *03-19 Chicago, IL - Thalia Hall *03-21 Seattle, WA - Tractor Tavern *03-22 Portland, OR - Polaris Hall *03-23 San Francisco, CA - Great American Music Hall *03-25 Los Angeles, CA - The Regent *03-28 Knoxville, TN - Big Ears Festival04-29 Norwich, England - Norwich Arts Centre04-30 Leeds, England - Brudenell Social Club05-01 Newcastle upon Tyne, England - Gosforth Civic Theatre05-02 Glasgow, Scotland - Mono05-03 Manchester, England - Gorilla05-06 Bristol, England - Trinity Centre05-07 Exeter, England - Phoenix05-08 Southampton, England - Papillon05-09 London, England - Hackney Church05-10 Brighton, England - Concorde 205-15 Istanbul, Turkey - Salon IKSV05-16 Warsaw, Poland - Niebo05-17 Berlin, Germany - XJazz!05-21 Paris, France - Le Petit Bain05-22 Lille, France - L’Aéronef05-23 Brussels, Belgium - La Botanique05-24 Amsterdam, Netherlands - Zonnehuis05-25 Nijmegen, Netherlands - Doornroosje05-26 Rotterdam, Netherlands - Bird06-01 Torino, Italy - Bunker (Jazz Is Dead)06-07 Cluj-Napoca, Romania - Jazz in the Park07-02-05 Roskilde, Denmark - Roskilde Festival07-04 Sète, France - Worldwide Festival07-17 Molde, Norway - Moldejazz* with Patrick ShiroishiAlabaster DePlume: A Blade Because Tour
